<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H5642|סְתַר]]</big>**</small>
 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָתַר‎</span> **verb** ==hide, conceal== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, derived species; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְתַר‎</span> Pa\`el, Ithpa\`al, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Pe\`al Passive participle, chiefly Pa\`el, Ithpa\`al, ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***veil, conceal, hide***, [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1304</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (rare) [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>354</sup>); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְתָּ֑ר‎</span> [[Prov.27.12|Prov 27:12]] + [[Prov.22.3|Prov 22:3]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּסָּתֵר‎</span>); 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְתַּ֫רְתָּ‎</span> [[1Sam.20.19|1Sam 20:19]] 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְתָּ֑רְנוּ‎</span> [[Isa.28.15|Isa 28:15]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסָּתֵר‎</span> [[Hos.13.14|Hos 13:14]] +; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶסָּתֵר‎</span> [[Gen.4.14|Gen 4:14]] +; 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסָּֽתְרוּ‎</span> [[Amos.9.3|Amos 9:3]] 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסָּתֵר‎</span> [[Gen.31.49|Gen 31:49]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִסָּתֵר‎</span> [[Jer.36.19|Jer 36:19]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהִסָּ֫תֶר שָׁם‎</span> [[Job.34.22|Job 34:22]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְתָּר‎</span> [[Ps.19.7|Ps 19:7]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְתָּרִים‎</span> [[Deut.7.20|Deut 7:20]] feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְתָּרֹת‎</span> [[Deut.29.28|Deut 29:28]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וֺת‎</span>- [[Ps.19.13|Ps 19:13]] — 

**1.** ***hide oneself***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> local, [[1Sam.20.5|1Sam 20:5]]; [[1Sam.20.24|1Sam 20:24]]; [[1Kgs.17.3|1Kgs 17:3]]; [[Jer.23.24|Jer 23:24]], so (figurative) [[Isa.28.15|Isa 28:15]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁם‎</span> [[1Sam.20.19|1Sam 20:19]]; [[Job.34.22|Job 34:22]] absolute [[Jer.36.19|Jer 36:19]]; [[Prov.22.3|Prov 22:3]]; [[Prov.27.12|Prov 27:12]]; [[Prov.28.28|Prov 28:28]]; [[Ps.89.47|Ps 89:47]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי‎</span> person [[Deut.7.20|Deut 7:20]]; [[Job.13.20|Job 13:20]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person [[Ps.55.13|Ps 55:13]]. 

**2.** ***be hid, concealed***, especially figurative of escaping God's notice, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי‎</span> person [[Gen.4.14|Gen 4:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלִּפְנֵי‎</span> [[Jer.16.17|Jer 16:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִנֶּגֶד עֵינַי‎</span> [[Amos.9.3|Amos 9:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעֵינַי‎</span> [[Isa.65.16|Isa 65:16]]; [[Hos.13.14|Hos 13:14]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹחַם‎</span>, i.e. I will not repent, change my purpose of judgment), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> [[Ps.38.10|Ps 38:10]]; [[Isa.40.27|Isa 40:27]] from heat of sun [[Ps.19.7|Ps 19:7]] (i.e. it penetrates everywhere); from birds [[Job.28.21|Job 28:21]] (of place of wisdom); reciprocal <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ מֵרֵעֵהוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסּ‎</span> [[Gen.31.49|Gen 31:49]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) when ***we are hidden each from the other*** (i.e. separated); absolute [[Num.5.13|Num 5:13]]; [[Job.3.23|Job 3:23]] (***whose way is hid*** that is, from himself), [[Zeph.2.3|Zeph 2:3]] (i.e. escape <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s judgment); participle ***hidden, secret things***, in general [[Deut.29.28|Deut 29:28]] of sins [[Ps.19.13|Ps 19:13]]. **Pi\`el** ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַתְּרִי‎</span> [[Isa.16.3|Isa 16:3]] ***carefully hide*** (i.e. ***shelter***) the outcasts (Moab speaks to Zion). **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַהֲבָה מְסֻתָּ֑רֶת‎</span> [[Prov.27.5|Prov 27:5]] ***love carefully concealed***. **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּסְתַּתָּ֑ר‎</span> [[Isa.29.14|Isa 29:14]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסְתַּתֵּר‎</span> [[1Sam.23.19|1Sam 23:19]] + 3 t.; — ***hide oneself carefully***, of David's taking refuge with (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span>) Ziphites [[1Sam.23.19|1Sam 23:19]] = [[Ps.54.2|Ps 54:2]] (title), in (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>) a hill [[1Sam.26.1|1Sam 26:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵל מ‎</span> [[Isa.45.15|Isa 45:15]] ***a God that completely hides himself***. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִסְתִּיר‎</span> [[Ps.10.11|Ps 10:11]]; [[Ps.22.25|Ps 22:25]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִסְתַּ֫רְתָּ‎</span> [[Ps.30.8|Ps 30:8]]; [[Isa.64.6|Isa 64:6]] etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַסְתִּיר‎</span> [[1Sam.20.2|1Sam 20:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּסְתֵּר‎</span> [[Exod.3.6|Exod 3:6]]; [[Job.3.10|Job 3:10]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַסְתִּרֵ֫נִי‎</span> [[Ps.27.5|Ps 27:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּסְתִּרֵם‎</span> [[Jer.36.26|Jer 36:26]] 3 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּסְתִּירֵ֫הוּ‎</span> [[2Chr.22.11|2Chr 22:11]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאַסְתִּר‎</span> [[Ezek.39.23|Ezek 39:23]]; [[Ezek.39.24|Ezek 39:24]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסְתֵּר‎</span> [[Ps.51.11|Ps 51:11]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסְתֵּר‎</span> [[Deut.31.18|Deut 31:18]]; [[Isa.57.17|Isa 57:17]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסְתֵּר‎</span> [[Prov.25.2|Prov 25:2]] (see [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 213 and references</sup>; yet compare infinitive absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָכֹל‎</span> v[[Prov.25.27|Prov 25:27]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַסְתִּר‎</span> [[Isa.29.15|Isa 29:15]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:53q»§ 53q</sup>); ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַסְתִּיר‎</span> [[Isa.8.17|Isa 8:17]] — ***conceal, hide:*** 

**1.** a person from (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי‎</span>) enemy [[2Kgs.11.2|2Kgs 11:2]] = [[2Chr.22.11|2Chr 22:11]] subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> [[Ps.64.3|Ps 64:3]], absolute [[Jer.36.26|Jer 36:26]] ***hide*** anything from (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>) one [[1Sam.20.2|1Sam 20:2]], a thing, in general, [[Prov.25.2|Prov 25:2]] anything (from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> in \|\| clause) [[Isa.29.15|Isa 29:15]] in general = ***shelter*** a person [[Job.14.13|Job 14:13]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> local (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) [[Ps.17.8|Ps 17:8]]; [[Ps.27.5|Ps 27:5]]; [[Ps.31.21|Ps 31:21]] (all metaphor); toil (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָמָל‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעֵינָ֑י‎</span> [[Job.3.10|Job 3:10]] commands from, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) [[Ps.119.19|Ps 119:19]] ***hide*** one as arrow in quiver [[Isa.49.2|Isa 49:2]]. 

**2.** especially ***hide*** the face: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** literally, of Moses [[Exod.3.6|Exod 3:6]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), usually figurative: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> i.e. be not observant of sin [[Ps.51.11|Ps 51:11]], absolute [[Ps.10.11|Ps 10:11]] more often 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> ***hides*** his face from (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person), i.e. withdraws his favour, [[Mic.3.4|Mic 3:4]]; [[Isa.8.17|Isa 8:17]]; [[Isa.54.8|Isa 54:8]]; [[Isa.64.6|Isa 64:6]]; [[Deut.31.17|Deut 31:17]]; [[Deut.32.20|Deut 32:20]]; [[Jer.33.5|Jer 33:5]]; [[Ezek.39.23|Ezek 39:23]]; [[Ezek.39.24|Ezek 39:24]]; [[Ezek.39.29|Ezek 39:29]]; [[Ps.13.2|Ps 13:2]]; [[Ps.22.25|Ps 22:25]]; [[Ps.27.9|Ps 27:9]]; [[Ps.69.18|Ps 69:18]]; [[Ps.88.15|Ps 88:15]]; [[Ps.102.3|Ps 102:3]]; [[Ps.143.7|Ps 143:7]] absolute [[Deut.31.18|Deut 31:18]]; [[Job.13.24|Job 13:24]]; [[Job.34.29|Job 34:29]]; [[Ps.30.8|Ps 30:8]] compare [[Ps.104.29|Ps 104:29]]; [[Ps.44.25|Ps 44:25]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּנִים‎</span> omitted [[Isa.57.17|Isa 57:17]] compare [[Isa.59.2|Isa 59:2]] your sins ***have hidden*** (his) ***face*** from (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>) you; of hiding one's face from (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>) shame, i.e. avoiding it [[Isa.50.6|Isa 50:6]] (of servant of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>).
